name: koom-mobile-app
description: KooM! - the alarm clock you can't snooze!

scripts.copy-splash-assets: for density in mdpi hdpi xhdpi xxhdpi xxxhdpi; do cp assets/generated-icons/android/drawable-${density}/splashscreen_logo.png android/app/src/main/res/drawable-${density}/splashscreen_logo.png; done
scripts.dev-build: pnpm copy-splash-assets && eas build --platform android --profile development --local
scripts.install-dev-build: OUTPUT_FILE=$(find . -type f -name "*.apk" -print0 | xargs -0 ls -t | head -n1) && adb install -r "$OUTPUT_FILE"
scripts.rebuild: pnpm dev-build && pnpm install-dev-build && pnpm start:devclient
scripts.android:clean: cd android && rm -rf app/.cxx app/build && cd .. && rm -rf node_modules/react-native-reanimated/android/build node_modules/react-native-webview/android/build node_modules/react-native-edge-to-edge/android/build
scripts.android:dev: pnpm android:clean && cd android && ./gradlew installDevDebug && cd .. && pnpm start:devclient
scripts.android:staging: pnpm android:clean && cd android && ./gradlew installStagingDebug && cd .. && pnpm start:devclient
scripts.android:prod: pnpm android:clean && cd android && ./gradlew installProdDebug && cd ..
scripts.android:all: pnpm android:clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd .. && for device in $(adb devices | grep -v List | grep device | awk '{print $1}'); do echo "Installing on $device..." && adb -s $device install -r android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk; done
scripts.ios:full-clean: unset CC CXX && sudo rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* && rm -rf ios/build && cd ios && rm -rf build Pods Podfile.lock && pod install && cd ..
scripts.ios:clean: unset CC CXX && rm -rf ios/build && cd ios && rm -rf build Pods Podfile.lock && pod install && cd ..
scripts.ios: unset CC CXX && npx expo run:ios --device
scripts.ios:dev: pnpm ios:clean && unset CC CXX && APP_VARIANT=dev npx expo run:ios --device
scripts.ios:dev:simulator: pnpm ios:clean && unset CC CXX && APP_VARIANT=dev npx expo run:ios
scripts.ios:dev-no-clean: unset CC CXX && APP_VARIANT=dev npx expo run:ios --device
scripts.ios:staging: unset CC CXX && APP_VARIANT=staging pnpm ios:clean && APP_VARIANT=staging npx expo run:ios --device && pnpm start:devclient
scripts.ios:prod: unset CC CXX && APP_VARIANT=production pnpm ios:clean && APP_VARIANT=production npx expo run:ios --device

author: Ursine Inc
